org.junitee.runner
Interface JUnitEEOutputProducer

All Superinterfaces:
junit.framework.TestListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractOutput
public interface JUnitEEOutputProducer
extends junit.framework.TestListener

The listener interface for receiving test runner events.

Since:
1.5
Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
Author:
Oliver Rossmueller

 void finish()
